start.titulo: Collect, trade and discover your Pokémon world!
start.subtitulo: In Cards AMI you can create your personal collection, discover new cards and trade them with other Pokémon enthusiasts.
start.coleccionaDesc: Save your favorite cards, organize your collection and create a wishlist. Your Pokémon library always up to date!
start.intercambiaDesc: Connect with other collectors or your friends and make safe trades to get the cards you're missing.
start.exploraDesc: Find the cards you're looking for, discover new expansions and stay updated on the latest news in the Pokémon world.

signUp.subtitulo: Join Cards AMI and start your collection today.
